title: SMC_CornerDistance (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_CornerDistance
Sets the transition parameters for distance based blending
(transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMCornerDistance
).
The outputs can be connected to the inputs
TransitionMode
and
TransitionParameter
of the movement function blocks.

rows.Name: TransitionMode
rows.Comment:
Can be connected to the input TransitionMode of the movement
function block.

rows:
Can be connected to the TransitionParameter input
of the movement function block.
